thread.title: Ed Sheeran rejected from Grammys after-party — not for the first time | Metro News
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran rejected from Grammys after-party — not for the first time | Metro News

author: Olivia Waring For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Ed Sheeran rejected from Grammys after-party — not for the first time | Metro News
text:
‘Strong’ Billie Lourd coping ‘well’ following deaths of Carrie Fisher and Debbie Reynolds 
‘You know what I don’t get? When you walk into those parties, there’s probably four musicians there and everyone else is just people from LA, who didn’t go to the Grammys and probably just want a party to go to,’ he moaned. 
Instead, Ed trotted off to Diplo and Benny Blanco’s party in the Hollywood Hills. But he didn’t have all that much luck there, either. Ed Sheeran hanging out with host James Corden and Nick Jonas at this year’s Grammys (Picture: Christopher Polk/Getty Images for NARAS) 
‘I arrived there super early and I was like, “This is really cool! No one’s here!”‘ he confessed. ‘And then suddenly 2,000 people turned up and I was like, “I’m going.”‘ 
D’oh! Mind you, Ed doesn’t seem to care much about socialising, preferring the rush of performing on stage. 
‘That’s my element. Performing is what I love doing,’ he said. ‘I’m more nervous to talk to people, because I’m not very good.’ 
Diddums. 
Well, at least not getting into the party means not embarrassing yourself by stumbling out of it .
